channel.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
channel.description:
A while ago i purchased a data plan of 10MB for my phone which costed alot here. :/
I tried going to http://moparisthebest.com/smf with images turned off on my browser settings and I was stuck at the TOS page which loads images no matter how my settings are set and that really eats up bandwidth. Tried clicking so many times on "I agree" but it would never let me go.
I tried with Opera Mini and i managed to get past but the images were still loading, while on other forums they like have it specially made for mobile the design to change to a really simple plain text one.
So my question is, does moparscape also have that layout feature for mobile phones? If so, what address should i type in? Sometimes i'm really bored and browsing the forum is fun.

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:13, topic:416151”]This will tell you your user-agent as seen by my site:

http://moparisthebest.com/ip.php

But does your phone have a full-fledged browser like Android or iPhone? I’m thinking you just have to use the wap2 interface with that browser:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?wap2[/quote]Got this as an user-agent: LG-KP500 Teleca/WAP2.0 MIDP-2.0/CLDC-1.1 UNTRUSTED/1.0

The second link takes me again to the TOS page which i can’t go through. It just always says that it’s loading and when i click the X to stop loading the page only half appears (mostly the blue background) and the “I agree” buttons are not visible.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:11, topic:416151"][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=518086.msg3766047#msg3766047 date=1317248231]
They still sell data plans? Get virgin mobile dude, free unlimited data with unlimited text.
[/quote]Really? I only have 1gb data for my iPhone from them. Although im in Canada so it might be different.[/quote]
You must have version, virgin mobile doesn’t support iphones. :o

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:416151”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=518086.msg3765673#msg3765673 date=1317233945]

Ah, well i found this:
User Agent: LG-KP500 Teleca/WAP2.0 MIDP-2.0/CLDC-1.1 UNTRUSTED/1.0

Source: http://mobilezoo.biz/handset_811393

I’m not sure if it’s the right thing tho, cause there is a “Browser User Agent:” which is blank.

To make sure, visit this site on your phone:
http://whatsmyuseragent.com/
[/quote]Doesn’t seem to load fully, i can only see the top parts of the website.

I tried refreshing the page atleast 4 times and it just won’t load.

Do you have javascript enabled?[/quote]Yeah. Cookies, Javascript, all are enabled except images.

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:9, topic:416151”]They still sell data plans? Get virgin mobile dude, free unlimited data with unlimited text. :D[/quote]We don’t seem to have that operator in Bulgaria.

You pay a high price for nothing. Horrible economy.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Ahh I remember now! You need to give him your user agent.

For instance if your browsing from a pc on mozilla it would look something like this: User Agent : mozilla/5.0 (windows; u; windows nt 6.1; en-us; rv:1.9.0.5) gecko/2008120122 firefox/3.0.5

Your phones agent will look much different then that ^ though.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:2, topic:416151”]Yes we do have a mobile theme here that is plain text with out images. You need to send MITB the header that your browser sends when it connects to the site though (or something along those lines.) If you PM him he’ll be more then happy to help ya out.[/quote]That’s great.

Header is the thing i get on the address bar after i type in http://moparisthebest.com/smf or something else?

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape forum on mobile
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Yes we do have a mobile theme here that is plain text with out images. You need to send MITB the header that your browser sends when it connects to the site though (or something along those lines.) If you PM him he’ll be more then happy to help ya out.

Read full topic
